title: The One With the Dozen Lasagnas

questions.question: What does Monica say to Aunt Syl about the lasagna?
options: I made it with extra cheese
I made it with a special sauce
questions.explanation: Monica tells her aunt that the lasagna has meat in every third layer.

questions.question: What is Ross reading to prepare for fatherhood?
questions.explanation: Ross has read all the baby books to prepare for fatherhood.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say people eat in some parts of the world?
questions.explanation: Phoebe mentions that in some parts of the world, people eat the placenta after birth.

questions.question: What is the result of Carol's amnio test?
options: The baby has a genetic disorder
questions.explanation: Carol tells Ross that the amnio test results show the baby is totally and completely healthy.

questions.question: What does Ross not want to know about the baby?
questions.explanation: Ross explicitly states that he does not want to know the sex of the baby.

questions.question: Why does Rachel think she didn't see Paolo's true nature?
options: Because he was charming and gorgeous
questions.correct_answer: Because he was charming and gorgeous
questions.explanation: Phoebe explains to Rachel that she didn't see Paolo's true nature because he is charming and gorgeous.

questions.question: What does Phoebe give Rachel to comfort her?
questions.explanation: Phoebe gives Rachel one of her famous oatmeal raisin cookies to comfort her.

questions.question: What is the new piece of furniture that Joey and Chandler buy?
questions.explanation: Joey and Chandler buy a new foosball table for their apartment.

questions.question: Why does Ross want to be the one to comfort Rachel?
options: Because he wants to be her friend
Because he wants to be her boyfriend
Because he wants to comfort Paolo
Because he wants to eat her cookies
questions.correct_answer: Because he wants to be her boyfriend
questions.explanation: Ross wants to be the one to comfort Rachel because he has feelings for her and wants to be with her.

questions.question: What does Ross finally learn about the baby?
questions.explanation: Ross finally learns that he is having a boy.

questions.question: What does Monica do to Joey and Chandler at foosball?
questions.explanation: Monica beats Joey and Chandler at foosball, scoring a shut-out.

questions.question: What does Paolo do to Phoebe during the massage?
options: He makes a pass at her
questions.correct_answer: He makes a pass at her
questions.explanation: Paolo makes a pass at Phoebe during the massage, which makes her uncomfortable.

questions.question: What does Rachel do with Paolo's clothes?
options: She throws them off the balcony
questions.correct_answer: She throws them off the balcony
questions.explanation: Rachel throws Paolo's clothes off the balcony after finding out about his infidelity.

questions.question: What is Phoebe's policy on lying?
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Rachel that she never lies, which is one of the three things Rachel should know about her.

questions.question: What does Ross want Rachel to know about him?
options: That he is a good listener
That he is a good cook
That he is a good friend
That he is everything Paolo is not
questions.correct_answer: That he is everything Paolo is not
questions.explanation: Ross wants Rachel to know that he is everything Paolo is not, implying that he is a better person and a better partner.

questions.question: What does Joey think Ross should do after Rachel breaks up with Paolo?
options: He should try to comfort her
He should try to win her over
questions.correct_answer: He should try to win her over
questions.explanation: Joey thinks Ross should try to win Rachel over after she breaks up with Paolo, by being there for her and showing her that he is a better partner.

questions.question: What is the name of the person who answers the door at Carol and Susan's apartment?
questions.explanation: Carol answers the door at her and Susan's apartment when Ross arrives with the lasagna.

questions.question: What does Ross bring to Carol and Susan's apartment?
questions.explanation: Ross brings a lasagna to Carol and Susan's apartment, which was made by Monica.

questions.question: What is the topic of conversation between Ross and Carol in the living room?
questions.explanation: Ross and Carol discuss the results of the amnio test, which show that the baby is healthy.

questions.question: What does Ross do when Paolo comes to the apartment to say goodbye?
options: He slams the door in his face
questions.correct_answer: He slams the door in his face
questions.explanation: Ross slams the door in Paolo's face when he comes to the apartment to say goodbye to Rachel.

questions.question: What does Phoebe tell Rachel about Paolo's behavior during the massage?
options: He made a pass at her
questions.correct_answer: He made a pass at her
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Rachel that Paolo made a pass at her during the massage, which made her uncomfortable.

questions.question: What is Rachel's reaction to Phoebe's revelation about Paolo?
questions.explanation: Rachel is shocked and upset when Phoebe tells her about Paolo's behavior during the massage.

questions.question: What does Ross think Rachel needs after breaking up with Paolo?
options: A more sophisticated screening process for guys
questions.correct_answer: A more sophisticated screening process for guys
questions.explanation: Ross thinks Rachel needs to develop a more sophisticated screening process for guys to avoid getting hurt again.

questions.question: What is the final scene of the episode?
options: Monica beating Joey and Chandler at foosball
questions.correct_answer: Monica beating Joey and Chandler at foosball
questions.explanation: The final scene of the episode shows Monica beating Joey and Chandler at foosball.

questions.question: What does Monica give Paolo when he leaves the apartment?
questions.explanation: Monica gives Paolo a lasagna when he leaves the apartment, along with instructions on how to heat it up.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say is one of the three things Rachel should know about her?
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Rachel that one of the three things she should know about her is that she never lies.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he finds out he is having a boy?
questions.explanation: Ross is shocked and babbling when he finds out he is having a boy.

questions.question: What does Joey think Ross should do to win Rachel over?
options: He should try to comfort her
He should try to win her over
questions.correct_answer: He should try to win her over
questions.explanation: Joey thinks Ross should try to win Rachel over by being there for her and showing her that he is a better partner.

questions.question: What is the name of the place where Joey and Chandler buy their new table?
questions.explanation: Joey and Chandler buy their new foosball table at The Table Store.

questions.question: What does Ross learn from Carol about the baby?
questions.explanation: Ross learns from Carol that he is having a boy.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do to comfort Rachel after she breaks up with Paolo?
options: She gives her a glass of milk
She gives her a shoulder to cry on
questions.explanation: Phoebe gives Rachel one of her famous oatmeal raisin cookies to comfort her after she breaks up with Paolo.
